cast.overview: High schoolers Mitsuha and Taki are complete strangers living separate lives. But one night, they suddenly switch places. Mitsuha wakes up in Taki’s body, and he in hers. This bizarre occurrence continues to happen randomly, and the two must adjust their lives around each other.
cast.title: Your Name.

details.biography: Yasuhiro Kikuchi (菊池 康弘, Kikuchi Yasuhiro, born September 29, 1973) is a Japanese actor and seiyū (voice actor) from the city of Hanamaki, Iwate Prefecture. He is affiliated with Atomic Monkey. He previously was affiliated with Advance Promotion and RME. His hobbies and special skills are making plastic models and karaoke. He suffers from an incurable disease called ankylosing spondylitis.
details.name: Yasuhiro Kikuchi
